detaileddescription.para: The iOS notification belongs to the "Other" category.
The iOS notification belongs to the "Incoming Call" category.
The iOS notification belongs to the "Missed Call" category.
The iOS notification belongs to the "Voice Mail" category.
The iOS notification belongs to the "Social" category.
The iOS notification belongs to the "Schedule" category.
The iOS notification belongs to the "Email" category.

The iOS notification belongs to the "Location" category.

briefdescription.para: Category IDs for iOS notifications.

detaileddescription.para: The iOS notification was added.
The iOS notification was modified.
The iOS notification was removed.

briefdescription.para: Event IDs for iOS notifications.

detaileddescription.para: Requests attributes to be sent from the NP to the NC for a given notification.
Requests attributes to be sent from the NP to the NC for a given iOS app.
Requests an action to be performed on a given notification. For example, dismiss an alarm.

briefdescription.para: Control point command IDs that the Notification Consumer can send to the Notification Provider.

detaileddescription.para: Positive action.
Negative action.

briefdescription.para: IDs for actions that can be performed for iOS notifications.

detaileddescription.para: Command used to get the display name for an app identifier.

briefdescription.para: App attribute ID values.

detaileddescription.para: Currently, only one value is defined. However, the number of app attributes might increase. For this reason, they are stored in an enumeration.
Identifies that the attribute data is of an "App Identifier" type.
Identifies that the attribute data is a "Title".
Identifies that the attribute data is a "Subtitle".
Identifies that the attribute data is a "Message".
Identifies that the attribute data is a "Message Size".
Identifies that the attribute data is a "Date".
The notification has a "Positive action" that can be executed associated with it.
The notification has a "Negative action" that can be executed associated with it.

briefdescription.para: IDs for iOS notification attributes.

detaileddescription.para: Parsing the command ID.
Parsing the notification UID.
Parsing app ID.
Parsing attribute ID.
Parsing the LSB of the attribute length.
Parsing the MSB of the attribute length.
Parsing the attribute data.
Parsing is skipped for the rest of an attribute (or entire attribute).
Parsing for one attribute is done.

briefdescription.para: Parsing states for received iOS notification and app attributes.

briefdescription.para: Write response callback function.

parameterdescription.para: ANCS client instance.
ATT error code.

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the ANCS client.

parameterdescription.para: ANCS client instance. This structure must be supplied by the application. It is initialized by this function and will later be used to identify this particular client instance.
If the client was initialized successfully. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Function for writing to the CCCD to enable notifications from the Apple Notification Service.

parameterdescription.para: ANCS client instance.
Callback function for handling notification.
If writing to the CCCD was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Function for writing to the CCCD to enable data source notifications from the ANCS.

parameterdescription.para: ANCS client instance.
Callback function for handling notification.
If writing to the CCCD was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Function for writing to the CCCD to disable notifications from the ANCS.

parameterdescription.para: ANCS client instance
If writing to the CCCD was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Function for writing to the CCCD to disable data source notifications from the ANCS.

parameterdescription.para: ANCS client instance.
If writing to the CCCD was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Function for performing a notification action.

parameterdescription.para: ANCS client instance.
The UUID of the notification for which to perform the action.
Perform a positive or negative action.
Callback function for handling NP write response.
If the operation is successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Function for assigning handles to ANCS client instance.

detaileddescription.para: Call this function when a link has been established with a peer to associate the link to this instance of the module. This makes it possible to handle several links and associate each link to a particular instance of this module.

parameterdescription.para: Discovery object.
ANCS client instance for associating the link.
If the operation is successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Apple Notification Center Service UUID.
Notification Source Characteristic UUID.
Control Point Characteristic UUID.
Data Source Characteristic UUID.

detaileddescription.para: Maximum data length of an iOS notification attribute.
Number of iOS notification categories: Other, Incoming Call, Missed Call, Voice Mail, Social, Schedule, Email, News, Health and Fitness, Business and Finance, Location, Entertainment.
Number of iOS notification attributes: AppIdentifier, Title, Subtitle, Message, MessageSize, Date, PositiveActionLabel, NegativeActionLabel.
Number of iOS application attributes: DisplayName.
Number of iOS notification events: Added, Modified, Removed.

briefdescription.para: Length of the iOS notification data.

detaileddescription.para: 0b.......1 Silent: First (LSB) bit is set. All flags can be active at the same time.
0b......1. Important: Second (LSB) bit is set. All flags can be active at the same time.
0b.....1.. Pre-existing: Third (LSB) bit is set. All flags can be active at the same time.
0b....1... Positive action: Fourth (LSB) bit is set. All flags can be active at the same time.
0b...1.... Negative action: Fifth (LSB) bit is set. All flags can be active at the same time.

briefdescription.para: Apple Notification Center Service Client module.
